# `@flutter-builder/metadata-enums`

```bash
yarn add @flutter-builder/metadata-enums
```

```ts
import type { FlutterEnumType } from "@flutter-builder/metadata-enums";
import { all } from "@flutter-builder/metadata-enums";

console.log(all);

// [
// {
//   "id": "animation/AnimationBehavior",
//   "url": "https://api.flutter.dev/flutter/animation/AnimationBehavior.html",
//   "name": "AnimationBehavior",
//   "values": [
//     "normal",
//     "preserve"
//   ]
// },
// ...
// ]
```
